The suit of a card is represented by an integer ranging from 1 to 4, corresponding respectively to Hearts, Diamonds, Spades, and Clubs.
getIntValue() - Method in class CardHand.Card
The value of a card ranges from 2 to 14, with the jack, queen, and king taking values 11, 12, and 13 respectively.
